T02TD1478E:116b-1: shr'i he ru ka s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02TD1478E:116b-3: dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02TD1478E:116b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1478E:116b-5: srid dang mya ngan 'das sdud cing //
T02TD1478E:116b-6: srid dang mya ngan 'das la bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:116b-8: dpa' bo rmad byung che la 'dud //
T02TD1478E:116b-9: lte ba'i dbus las byung zhing phra //
T02TD1478E:116b-10: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs la gnas //
T02TD1478E:116b-11: mkha' 'gro rnams kyang sdud mdzad mo //
T02TD1478E:116b-12: gtum mo de la bdag phyag 'tshal ;
T02TD1478E:116b-13: / yang dag rtogs pa'i gnas min zhing //
T02TD1478E:116b-14: mkhas pa yis kyang rnyed dka'o //
T02TD1478E:116b-15: gang gis drin gyis rnyed slar gyur //
T02TD1478E:116b-16: bla ma'i zhal snga rgyal gyur cig / skal ldan sems can don bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1478E:116b-17: man ngag cung zad la brten te //
T02TD1478E:116b-18: dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni //
T02TD1478E:116b-19: sgrub thabs de ni bdag gis bya //
T02TD1478E:116b-20: dur khrod dag gam chu dogs sam //
T02TD1478E:116b-21: yang na dgon pa chen por ni //
T02TD1478E:116b-22: he ru kar grags thugs rje che //
T02TD1478E:116b-23: sgrub pa'i dbang pos mnyes par bya //
T02TD1478E:116b-24: langs nas dang por snying ga yi //
T02TD1478E:116b-26: de yi dbus su yi ge ni //
T02TD1478E:116b-27: thugs las byung ba rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1478E:116b-28: de yi lus ngag yid kyis ni //
T02TD1478E:116b-29: chos rnams stong pa nyid du bsgom //
T02TD1478E:116b-30: 'od kyis bla ma rang lha dang //
T02TD1478E:116b-31: sangs rgyas rnams ni rang snang bya //
T02TD1478E:116b-32: nam mkha' khyab par bsams nas ni //
T02TD1478E:116b-33: mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag spro //
T02TD1478E:116b-34: de yis legs par mnyes byas la //
T02TD1478E:116b-35: gus pas pus mo gnyis btsugs te //
T02TD1478E:116b-36: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1478E:116b-37: tshigs bcad gsum ni lan gsum brjod //
T02TD1478E:116b-38: de rjes byams dang snying rje dang //
T02TD1478E:116b-39: dga' ba btang snyoms bsgom par bya //
T02TD1478E:116b-40: gang phyir gnyid log sad pa yi //
T02TD1478E:116b-41: bye brag gsal bar mi dmigs pas //
T02TD1478E:116b-42: de phyir sems kyi rnam 'phrul ni //
T02TD1478E:116b-43: 'di dag thams cad log pa yin //
T02TD1478E:116b-44: gcig dang du mas rnam dpyad na //
T02TD1478E:116b-45: phyi yi dngos po dmigs mi 'gyur //
T02TD1478E:116b-46: 'di dag sems kyi gzugs su 'ang min //
T02TD1478E:117a-2: rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa ni //
T02TD1478E:117a-3: skye ba'i chos dang rnam bral zhing //
T02TD1478E:117a-4: sos ka'i nyi ma phyed dus kyi //
T02TD1478E:117a-5: sprin med nam mkha' lta bur bsam //
T02TD1478E:117a-6: sems 'di brtan par byed pa yi //
T02TD1478E:117a-7: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod bar bya //
T02TD1478E:117a-8: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharma: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02TD1478E:117a-9: aom sh'u n+ya t'a sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1478E:117a-10: de nas pam byung padma dang //
T02TD1478E:117a-11: ram las byung ba nyi dkyil du //
T02TD1478E:117a-12: h'um las khro bo'i rdo rje ni //
T02TD1478E:117a-13: spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis bsam //
T02TD1478E:117a-14: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um h'um phat //
T02TD1478E:117a-15: aom gri hna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1478E:117a-16: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1478E:117a-17: aom a'a ni ya ho: bha ga w'a na badzra bi dy'a r'a dz'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD1478E:117a-18: 'dis ni gdug pa bkug nas kyang //
T02TD1478E:117a-19: 'og nas bshad pas phur bus gdab //
T02TD1478E:117a-20: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dushtam phat k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1478E:117a-21: aom badzra mudgar badzra k'i la aa ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1478E:117a-22: phur bus gdab cing brdung ba yis //
T02TD1478E:117a-23: de yis glags skabs mi rnyed phyir /
T02TD1478E:117a-24: rdo rje dra ba bsam par bya //
T02TD1478E:117a-25: de yi nang du chos dbyings ni //
T02TD1478E:117a-26: bha ga'i dbyings su rnam par bsam //
T02TD1478E:117a-27: rlung dang me chu sa rnams kyi //
T02TD1478E:117a-29: de rnams steng du ri rab ste //
T02TD1478E:117a-30: de yi steng du h'um byung bsam //
T02TD1478E:117a-31: rlung sogs yongs su gyur pa las //
T02TD1478E:117a-32: gzhal yas khang ni nyid gyur pa //
T02TD1478E:117a-33: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1478E:117a-34: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1478E:117a-35: dra ba dra phyed chun 'phyang dang //
T02TD1478E:117a-36: me long la sogs rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD1478E:117a-37: dbus su sna tshogs padma yis //
T02TD1478E:117a-39: lte ba la ni 'jigs byed dang //
T02TD1478E:117a-40: dus mtshan dag ni rab tu bsgom //
T02TD1478E:117a-41: phyogs kyi 'dab ma bzhi po la //
T02TD1478E:117a-42: ro ni gdan gyi gzugs can yin //
T02TD1478E:117a-43: 'dab ma gzhan la bdud rtsis gang //
T02TD1478E:117a-44: snod ni bum pa la gnas bsam //
T02TD1478E:117a-45: de rjes cho ga bzhin du ni //
T02TD1478E:117a-46: thugs gsung sku yi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1478E:117a-47: 'khor lo gsum po rdo rje dang //
T02TD1478E:117a-49: gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du //
T02TD1478E:117a-50: dur khrod rnam pa brgyad kyis brgyan //
T02TD1478E:117a-51: de yi ming dang mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1478E:117b-0: de @117b bzhin lung gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1478E:117b-1: gtum drag gcig gi dbyings can ni //
T02TD1478E:117b-2: gnyis pa tshang tshing gsum pa yin //
T02TD1478E:117b-3: 'bar ba zhes bya bzhi pa ste //
T02TD1478E:117b-4: dmyal sogs zhes bya lnga pa yin //
T02TD1478E:117b-5: mi bzad pa dang ha har dgod //
T02TD1478E:117b-6: brgyad pa g-yer ka can du 'dod //
T02TD1478E:117b-7: dang po tshig par bshad bya ste ;
T02TD1478E:117b-8: / gnyis pa yang ni ma tshig par //
T02TD1478E:117b-9: gsum pa dum bur gyur pa yin //
T02TD1478E:117b-10: bzhi pa dum bur ma gyur pa'o //
T02TD1478E:117b-11: lnga pa 'jigs pa zhes bshad de //
T02TD1478E:117b-12: drug pa 'jigs par byed pa yin //
T02TD1478E:117b-13: bdun pa mdung rtser bskyon pa ste /
T02TD1478E:117b-15: pa ta li dang punta li ;
T02TD1478E:117b-16: / s'a la'i shing dang shri sha dang //
T02TD1478E:117b-17: au dumw'a ra n+ya gro dha //
T02TD1478E:117b-18: aa shva da n'a ga ge sar shing //
T02TD1478E:117b-19: khra dang byi la 'ug pa dang //
T02TD1478E:117b-20: stag dang khyi dang bya rgod phag / sha za'i gdong bcas brgyad po ni //
T02TD1478E:117b-21: shing brgyad la ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD1478E:117b-22: khra dang ce sbyang 'ug pa dang //
T02TD1478E:117b-23: brtan po khyi dang srin po phag / ro langs khro bo'i dregs bdo ba //
T02TD1478E:117b-24: brgyad kyis gtso bo yang dag bskor //
T02TD1478E:117b-25: sred dang sdang ba dag gi steng //
T02TD1478E:117b-26: zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1478E:117b-27: a'a li k'a li gnyis las byung //
T02TD1478E:117b-28: sems can zhu ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1478E:117b-29: bsams nas nga rgyal tsam nyid kyis //
T02TD1478E:117b-30: rnal 'byor bde ba'i bdag can bya //
T02TD1478E:117b-31: de nas gzhan don la yang 'bad //
T02TD1478E:117b-32: 'dis gnas bya ba ma yin la //
T02TD1478E:117b-33: de ltar shes pa lha mo yis //
T02TD1478E:117b-34: bstod par gyur las yang dag byung //
T02TD1478E:117b-35: h'um dpa' mo rol cig rol cig ho: //
T02TD1478E:117b-36: bde ba chen po rdo rje khyod //
T02TD1478E:117b-37: bde chen las byung ro nyid las ;
T02TD1478E:117b-38: /'di nyid du ni bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD1478E:117b-39: khyod ni bde ba chen po mchog / de bzhin dgyes pa'i bde ba yis //
T02TD1478E:117b-40: bdag kyang de ltar gsol bar mdzod //
T02TD1478E:117b-41: bcom ldan bde chen dgyes pa ho //
T02TD1478E:117b-42: aom rdo rje sems dpa' legs dgyes khyod //
T02TD1478E:117b-43: ro dang ro mchog thams cad kyis ;
T02TD1478E:117b-44: / dgyes pa chen po'i bde rnams la //
T02TD1478E:117b-45: bsgrub bya kun la rtag par yang //
T02TD1478E:117b-46: rol cig rol cig dgyes kun la //
T02TD1478E:117b-47: rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes mdzad do //
T02TD1478E:117b-48: bcom ldan rdo rje padma h'um //
T02TD1478E:117b-50: bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas legs dgyes khyod //
T02TD1478E:118a-2: padma'i 'dab ma aa la la ho //
T02TD1478E:118a-3: rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pa yis //
T02TD1478E:118a-4: bde 'byung dra ba'i rtag pa yang //
T02TD1478E:118a-6: padma'i dgyes pas slad nas rol //
T02TD1478E:118a-7: rdo rje mchog 'chang da ltar yang //
T02TD1478E:118a-8: ngo mtshar bde ba 'di nyid mthong //
T02TD1478E:118a-9: shin tu bde pa'i grub pa nyid //
T02TD1478E:118a-10: ji ltar da ltar bsdu bar mdzod //
T02TD1478E:118a-11: byang chub tshogs dang bcas pa dag / da ltar thob mdzad aa la la ho //
T02TD1478E:118a-12: bde chen rol pa dam pa bsgrubs //
T02TD1478E:118a-13: glu 'di yi ni ngor mdzad pas //
T02TD1478E:118a-14: sems can don mdzad par bskyod de //
T02TD1478E:118a-15: bam h'um gnyis las gri gug dang //
T02TD1478E:118a-16: rdo rje ltar spros bdag nyid can //
T02TD1478E:118a-17: bsgoms te thams cad yongs gyur las //
T02TD1478E:118a-18: bdag nyid he ru ka dpal 'gyur //
T02TD1478E:118a-19: sku mdog gnag cing zhal bzhir ldan //
T02TD1478E:118a-20: dbu skra 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes //
T02TD1478E:118a-21: spyan gsum mnga' zhing smin ma ser //
T02TD1478E:118a-22: dbu la thod pa zla bas brgyan //
T02TD1478E:118a-23: thod pa'i phreng ba lnga bcu mnga' //
T02TD1478E:118a-24: sku la thal ba'i rngul gyis bsgos //
T02TD1478E:118a-25: phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan zhing //
T02TD1478E:118a-26: g-yas brkyang pa la gnas pas bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:118a-27: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa dang //
T02TD1478E:118a-28: gar gyi nyams ni dgu dang ldan //
T02TD1478E:118a-29: gdul dka' 'dul ba mkhas pa'i phyir //
T02TD1478E:118a-30: lha chen ma h'a'i steng na bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:118a-31: gnag dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02TD1478E:118a-32: zhal bzhi g-yon nas bskor ba mnga' //
T02TD1478E:118a-33: phyag ni bcu gnyis dang ldan zhing //
T02TD1478E:118a-34: phag mo yis ni mgul nas 'khyud //
T02TD1478E:118a-35: rdo rje g-yas dang dril bu g-yon //
T02TD1478E:118a-36: phyag gis kun nas 'khyud mdzad pa //
T02TD1478E:118a-37: phyag gnyis brkyang bas glang chen lpags //
T02TD1478E:118a-38: da ma ru dang dgra sta dang //
T02TD1478E:118a-39: gri gug de bzhin rtse gsum 'phyar //
T02TD1478E:118a-40: g-yas pa'i phyag gis 'dzin par mdzad //
T02TD1478E:118a-41: kha tv'am ga dang padma'i snod //
T02TD1478E:118a-42: zhags pa de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo / g-yon na bsnams shing mgon po ni //
T02TD1478E:118a-43: mchog tu dga' ba'i tshul 'dzin bzhugs ;
T02TD1478E:118a-44: / rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig dang //
T02TD1478E:118a-45: spyan gsum ldan pas kun du 'khyud //
T02TD1478E:118a-46: yan lag phyag rgya drug gis brgyan //
T02TD1478E:118a-47: thod dum 'og pags dag gis bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:118a-48: byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing //
T02TD1478E:118a-49: bde ba chen po'i gnas kyis bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:118b-0: chags pa chen po'i @118b 'od dmar bar //
T02TD1478E:118b-1: rang snang ba yang yang dag byung //
T02TD1478E:118b-2: nu rgyas rked dbus phra ba dang //
T02TD1478E:118b-3: sku smad cha ni rab zheng che //
T02TD1478E:118b-4: dbu skra gnag cing spyan mdzes pa //
T02TD1478E:118b-5: sgeg pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin //
T02TD1478E:118b-6: g-yas kyis gdug la sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02TD1478E:118b-7: gri gug rdo rjes mtshan pa dang //
T02TD1478E:118b-8: g-yon pa'i phyag gis gdug pa yi //
T02TD1478E:118b-9: bdud sogs khrag can thod pa bsnams //
T02TD1478E:118b-10: mi bzad bskal pa'i me 'dra zhing //
T02TD1478E:118b-11: khrag 'dzag pa la rnam par dgyes //
T02TD1478E:118b-12: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang //
T02TD1478E:118b-13: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
T02TD1478E:118b-14: phyogs kyi padmar gtso bo yi //
T02TD1478E:118b-15: zhal dang rjes su mthun par bsam //
T02TD1478E:118b-16: 'dab ma gzhan la cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1478E:118b-17: bshad pa'i snod ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1478E:118b-18: 'di rnams phyag g-yas gri gug ste //
T02TD1478E:118b-19: g-yon na bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i //
T02TD1478E:118b-20: thod pa nyid dang kha tv'am ga / sku gsung thugs rnams dag rtsol rnams //
T02TD1478E:118b-21: de yi phyi rol thugs 'khor lo ;
T02TD1478E:118b-22: / rdo rje phreng ba nag pos bskor //
T02TD1478E:118b-23: phyogs mtshams cha ni brgyad po ru //
T02TD1478E:118b-24: rab gtum mo sogs mkha' grub stsol //
T02TD1478E:118b-25: de'i rgyab gsung gi 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1478E:118b-26: padma dmar po sogs brgyan par //
T02TD1478E:118b-27: sa srung mo sogs brgyad po bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:118b-28: de'i rgyab sku yi 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1478E:118b-29: 'khor lo dkar po sogs brgyan par //
T02TD1478E:118b-30: 'khor lo'i shugs sogs brgyad po bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:118b-33: zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa la //
T02TD1478E:118b-34: rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1478E:118b-35: lha mo gri gug thod pa bsnams ;
T02TD1478E:118b-37: 'di rnams thabs gyur dpa' bo ni //
T02TD1478E:118b-38: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs yin la //
T02TD1478E:118b-39: kun kyang rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
T02TD1478E:118b-40: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1478E:118b-41: mi mgo yi ni do shal can //
T02TD1478E:118b-42: mi bzad sku 'chang dbu skra mdzes //
T02TD1478E:118b-43: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste //
T02TD1478E:118b-44: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
T02TD1478E:118b-45: thod pa'i dum bus rnam brgyan zhing //
T02TD1478E:118b-46: dar dang phreng bas rnam par klubs //
T02TD1478E:118b-47: he ru ka dpal bzhugs tshul ltar //
T02TD1478E:118b-48: g-yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:118b-49: dpa' bo rnams kyi sku mdog ni //
T02TD1478E:119a-2: khva dang 'ug pa de bzhin khyi //
T02TD1478E:119a-3: phag gdong rang gi ming bzhin no //
T02TD1478E:119a-4: sgo yi lha mo'i zhal dang ni //
T02TD1478E:119a-5: mdog sogs mkha' 'gro ma sogs mthun //
T02TD1478E:119a-6: gshin rje brtan ma gnag dang ljang //
T02TD1478E:119a-7: gshin rje pho nya ljang dang dkar //
T02TD1478E:119a-8: de bzhin gshin rje mche ba can ;
T02TD1478E:119a-9: / dmar dang ser bar shes par bya //
T02TD1478E:119a-10: gzhan yang gshin rje 'joms ma ni //
T02TD1478E:119a-11: ser dang nag por rab tu bshad //
T02TD1478E:119a-12: dang po lha mo g-yon skor te //
T02TD1478E:119a-13: de bzhin gzhan dag g-yas skor yin //
T02TD1478E:119a-14: de lta bu yi 'khor lo che //
T02TD1478E:119a-15: bdag nyid dang ni bcas par bsgom //
T02TD1478E:119a-16: rab gtum ma dang gtum pa'i mig /'od ldan ma dang sna chen ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-17: dpa' bo'i blo ma mi'u thung ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-18: lang ka'i dbang phyug shing grib ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-19: sa srung ma dang 'jigs chen ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-20: rlung gi shugs ma chang 'thung ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-21: sngo bsangs ma dang rab bzang ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-22: rta rnam dang bya gdong ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-23: 'khor lo shugs ma du ma skyes ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-24: sna chen 'khor lo'i lam mo dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-25: shin tu dpa' mo stobs chen ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-26: 'khor los sgyur ba stobs chen ma //
T02TD1478E:119a-27: thod pa'i dum bu keng rus can //
T02TD1478E:119a-28: keng rus chen po mche ba gtsigs //
T02TD1478E:119a-29: chang dga' dgra ni 'od dpag med //
T02TD1478E:119a-30: rdo rje'i 'od dang rdo rje'i sku //
T02TD1478E:119a-31: myu gu rdo rje'i ral pa can ;
T02TD1478E:119a-32: / dpal chen rdo rje h'um mdzad dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-33: rab bzang dang ni rdo rje bzang //
T02TD1478E:119a-34: 'jigs byed chen mo mig mi bzang //
T02TD1478E:119a-35: stobs chen rdo rje rin chen dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-36: rta mgrin nam mkha'i snying po dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-37: he ru ka dpal bdag rang dbang //
T02TD1478E:119a-38: rnam snang rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1478E:119a-39: mgo dang spyi gtsug rna ba g-yas ;
T02TD1478E:119a-40: / rgyab dang rna ba g-yon pa dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-41: smin ma dbugs dang mig dang ni //
T02TD1478E:119a-42: de bzhin du ni dpung mgo gnyis //
T02TD1478E:119a-43: mchan khung gnyis dang nu ma gnyis //
T02TD1478E:119a-44: lte ba dang ni sna rtse gnyis //
T02TD1478E:119a-45: kha dang lkog mar rnam dgod cing //
T02TD1478E:119a-46: snying ga dang ni mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-47: gsang gnas gzhang kha de bzhin brla //
T02TD1478E:119a-48: byin pa sor mo rnams dang ni //
T02TD1478E:119a-49: rkang mthil de bzhin mthe bo dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-50: pus mo dag la rim bzhin gnas //
T02TD1478E:119a-51: pull'i ra dang dz'a lan dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-52: ao dya na de bzhin aarbu dang //
T02TD1478E:119a-53: gtso bo'i gnas su gyur pa yin //
T02TD1478E:119a-54: nga yi sngar bshad bzhi po gzhan //
T02TD1478E:119b-0: mtshams su gnas @119b par gyur pa yang //
T02TD1478E:119b-1: nye ba'i gnas kyi steng na bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:119b-2: go d'a ba r'ir gyur pa gcig / r'a me shva r'ir gnas gnyis pa //
T02TD1478E:119b-3: de w'i ko ta m'a la ber //
T02TD1478E:119b-4: lha mo gzhan gnyis gnas pa yin //
T02TD1478E:119b-5: k'a ma r'u pa ao ter ni //
T02TD1478E:119b-6: zhing gi gtso mo gnyis gnas so //
T02TD1478E:119b-7: ko sal tri sha ku ner bcas //
T02TD1478E:119b-8: nye ba'i zhing gtogs gzhan dag gnas //
T02TD1478E:119b-9: ka lingga dang lam b'a ka / tshando har bshad pa ru gzhan //
T02TD1478E:119b-10: k'anytsi dang ni gangs can du'ang //
T02TD1478E:119b-11: nye ba'i tshando har gtogs nas //
T02TD1478E:119b-12: gri ha de ba ta de bzhin //
T02TD1478E:119b-13: pre ta pu rir bcas par ni //
T02TD1478E:119b-14: 'dus par gtogs pa gzhan gnas so //
T02TD1478E:119b-15: su barna dv'i bar bcas pa'o //
T02TD1478E:119b-16: soo r'ashta ni nye ba yi //
T02TD1478E:119b-17: 'dus par bshad de gzhan dag gnas //
T02TD1478E:119b-18: na gar sindhu'i yul dag ni //
T02TD1478E:119b-19: dur khrod yin te gnyis rtag gnas //
T02TD1478E:119b-20: ma ro nyid dang ku lu t'a //
T02TD1478E:119b-21: gang yang lha mo gzhan gnas der //
T02TD1478E:119b-22: nye ba'i dur khrod yin zhes bya //
T02TD1478E:119b-23: des 'di sa yi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1478E:119b-24: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni //
T02TD1478E:119b-25: 'khor lo'i rnam par rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:119b-26: thugs gsung sku yi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1478E:119b-27: 'jig rten gsum na rnam par grol //
T02TD1478E:119b-28: mtho ris sa bla sa 'og tu //
T02TD1478E:119b-29: skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur //
T02TD1478E:119b-30: pu dz'a aoo aa go r'a de ma //
T02TD1478E:119b-31: k'a ao tri ko ka la k'a hi //
T02TD1478E:119b-32: pre gra soo su nam si ma ku //
T02TD1478E:119b-33: gzugs ni rnam snang yin zhes bya //
T02TD1478E:119b-34: tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin //
T02TD1478E:119b-37: rnam shes phung por gyur pa yis //
T02TD1478E:119b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:119b-39: he ru ka dpal mgon rang nyid //
T02TD1478E:119b-40: gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa na //
T02TD1478E:119b-41: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:119b-42: 'di ni dag par rab tu bshad //
T02TD1478E:119b-43: mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02TD1478E:119b-44: rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1478E:119b-45: sna ni phrag dog rdo rje ste //
T02TD1478E:119b-47: reg pa ser sna rdo rje ste //
T02TD1478E:119b-48: yid ni rdo rje 'dzin dbang po ;
T02TD1478E:119b-49: / he ru ka dpal bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1478E:119b-50: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:119b-51: sa ni ltung byed ma zhes bya //
T02TD1478E:119b-52: gsod mchu yi khams yin te //
T02TD1478E:119b-53: me ni 'gugs ma yin par bshad //
T02TD1478E:119b-54: gar dbang rlung du bshad pa yin //
T02TD1478E:119b-55: nam mkha'i khams ni rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1478E:120a-2: phung po khams dang skye mched kyi //
T02TD1478E:120a-3: dag pa yin par 'di bshad do //
T02TD1478E:120a-4: rdo rje gsum la yig gsum dgod //
T02TD1478E:120a-5: ye shes yi ge he badzra //
T02TD1478E:120a-6: mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo sbyar //
T02TD1478E:120a-7: mthe bo rdo rje brtan por sbyar //
T02TD1478E:120a-8: de ni dpral ba'i dbus bzhag nas ;
T02TD1478E:120a-9: / gcu zhing bskor bas bskor bar bya //
T02TD1478E:120a-10: rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta'o //
T02TD1478E:120a-11: gyen du phat kyi sgra sgrogs shing //
T02TD1478E:120a-12: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD1478E:120a-14: phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che //
T02TD1478E:120a-15: kun spyod cho ga las bshad de //
T02TD1478E:120a-17: 'jig rten gsum yang bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1478E:120a-18: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1478E:120a-19: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham /
T02TD1478E:120a-20: aom yo ga shuddha:sarba dharm'a:yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02TD1478E:120a-21: aom ha dpal rdo rje sems dpa' //
T02TD1478E:120a-22: snying gar rnam par dgod par bya //
T02TD1478E:120a-23: na ma hi ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1478E:120a-24: mgo bor gnas pa rnam par bsam //
T02TD1478E:120a-25: sv'a h'a hu ni pad gar dbang //
T02TD1478E:120a-26: spyi gtsug tu ni yongs su bsgom //
T02TD1478E:120a-27: boo shta he ni phrag pa ru //
T02TD1478E:120a-28: dpal ldan he ru kar bsam bya //
T02TD1478E:120a-29: h'um h'um ho ni rdo rje nyi //
T02TD1478E:120a-30: mig tu rnam par dgod par bya //
T02TD1478E:120a-31: phat ham yan lag thams cad du //
T02TD1478E:120a-32: mtshon char rta mchog rnam par bsam //
T02TD1478E:120a-33: dpa' bo thams cad 'di nyid kyis //
T02TD1478E:120a-34: yan lag drug gis rab tu dgod //
T02TD1478E:120a-35: aom bam rdo rje phag mo ni //
T02TD1478E:120a-36: lte ba'i phyogs su bsam par bya //
T02TD1478E:120a-37: ha yom ya mi ni snying gar //
T02TD1478E:120a-38: hrim mom rmongs byed ma kha la //
T02TD1478E:120a-39: hrem hrim skyong byed ma spyi bo //
T02TD1478E:120a-40: h'um h'um skrag byed ma spyi gtsug / phat phat yan lag kun mtshon char //
T02TD1478E:120a-41: gtum mo yongs su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1478E:120a-42: rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad kyi //
T02TD1478E:120a-44: de nas dngos grub kun stsol ba'i //
T02TD1478E:120a-45: bde gshegs rnams la dbang bskur stsol//
T02TD1478E:120a-46: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1478E:120a-47: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba //
T02TD1478E:120a-48: de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chu //
T02TD1478E:120a-49: dag pa yis ni khrus bgyi'o //
T02TD1478E:120a-50: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD1478E:120a-52: dpal ldan mi bskyod cod pan can //
T02TD1478E:120b-0: snying @120b ga'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus //
T02TD1478E:120b-1: sangs rgyas bkug nas zhu tshul du //
T02TD1478E:120b-2: bad gnas pa spu'i bu ga las //
T02TD1478E:120b-3: mchod pa'i lha mor bdag cag spro //
T02TD1478E:120b-4: de nas rkang pa brgyad sngags kyis //
T02TD1478E:120b-5: dbye ba rnam par spangs te bstod //
T02TD1478E:120b-6: bdag nyid lha yi gzugs can te //
T02TD1478E:120b-7: chos kun de yi bdag nyid can ;
T02TD1478E:120b-8: / de nas rlung me padmar ni //
T02TD1478E:120b-9: rang 'byung dang ni gzhi mnyam dang //
T02TD1478E:120b-10: gla rtsi dang ni ga pur dang //
T02TD1478E:120b-11: rta mchog gis ni yang dag brgyan //
T02TD1478E:120b-12: h'um gis rdo rje dkar legs dpyad //
T02TD1478E:120b-13: aa yis rab tu rtogs byas shing //
T02TD1478E:120b-15: byin gyis brlabs nas mngon par bza' //
T02TD1478E:120b-17: h'um byung rdo rje dkar po dgod //
T02TD1478E:120b-18: phyi nang bdag nyid can gyi gzugs //
T02TD1478E:120b-19: 'khor lo de yis rab tshim bya //
T02TD1478E:120b-20: 'khor lo bzhir ni rab brtags pa //
T02TD1478E:120b-21: 'khor lo ma lus kun dpyad bya //
T02TD1478E:120b-22: dpa' bo sa bon lce ru bsam //
T02TD1478E:120b-23: aa wa dh'u t'i'i gnas de la //
T02TD1478E:120b-24: rkan gyi phyogs su lce sbyar la //
T02TD1478E:120b-25: byas nas rnal 'byor ba yis bsgom //
T02TD1478E:120b-26: rkan gyi phyogs su gyur lha mo //
T02TD1478E:120b-27: bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa la //
T02TD1478E:120b-28: brgyad pa'i dang po bcu drug pa //
T02TD1478E:120b-29: dang po'i 'og ma sa bon yin //
T02TD1478E:120b-30: man ngag dag ni 'di nyid kyis //
T02TD1478E:120b-31: spros pa med pa'i gnas rtogs 'gyur //
T02TD1478E:120b-32: 'khor los sgyur ba'i gsang sngags ni //
T02TD1478E:120b-33: cho ga bzhin du bzlas par bya //
T02TD1478E:120b-34: mgon po'i snying po'am yang na ni //
T02TD1478E:120b-35: de yi nye ba'i snying po'am //
T02TD1478E:120b-36: lha mo'i snying po gnyis ka ni //
T02TD1478E:120b-37: ji srid mi skyo bar du bzlas //
T02TD1478E:120b-38: de nas rnal 'byor mas lha mo //
T02TD1478E:120b-39: rnam pa byang chub phyogs su bsgom //
T02TD1478E:120b-40: lus dang tshor ba chos dang sems //
T02TD1478E:120b-41: dran pa nyer gzhag dngos las byung //
T02TD1478E:120b-42: mkha' 'gro de bzhin l'a ma dang //
T02TD1478E:120b-43: dum skyes gzugs can ma rnams yin //
T02TD1478E:120b-45: sems nyid bzhi par gyur pa ste //
T02TD1478E:120b-46: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po la //
T02TD1478E:120b-47: rab gtum la sogs bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02TD1478E:120b-48: dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan //
T02TD1478E:120b-49: de las gzhan pa bzhi yin no //
T02TD1478E:120b-50: dbang po lnga po las 'dir ni //
T02TD1478E:120b-51: sa srung mar yang 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1478E:121a-2: / ting 'dzin shes rab bcas pa yi //
T02TD1478E:121a-3: stobs lnga yi ni gsung can gyi //
T02TD1478E:121a-6: shin tu sbyangs dang chos rnams 'byed //
T02TD1478E:121a-7: dran dang btang snyoms rnams las ni //
T02TD1478E:121a-8: de las gzhan pa'i lha mo bdun //
T02TD1478E:121a-9: yang dag lta ba stobs chen mo //
T02TD1478E:121a-10: 'khor los sgyur ma yang dag rtog / yang dag ngag ni brtson chen ma //
T02TD1478E:121a-11: yang dag las ni khva gdong ma //
T02TD1478E:121a-13: yang dag rtsol ba khyi gdong can //
T02TD1478E:121a-14: yang dag dran pa phag gdong yin //
T02TD1478E:121a-15: ting nge 'dzin du bcom ldan bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:121a-16: dge ba'i chos rnams bskyed pa la //
T02TD1478E:121a-17: gshin rje brtan ma yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1478E:121a-18: dge ba'i chos rnams skyes pa rnams //
T02TD1478E:121a-19: gshin rje pho nya srung bar byed //
T02TD1478E:121a-20: sdig pa'i las rnams bskyed pa de //
T02TD1478E:121a-21: spong ba gshin rje pho nya ma //
T02TD1478E:121a-22: sdig pa rnams ni mi 'byung phyir ;
T02TD1478E:121a-23: / gshin rje 'joms ma bzhugs pa yin //
T02TD1478E:121a-24: de ltar bsgoms pa dag gyur nas //
T02TD1478E:121a-25: mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1478E:121a-26: ci nus par ni bzlas byas nas //
T02TD1478E:121a-27: de yi 'og tu gtor ma dbul //
T02TD1478E:121a-28: sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis //
T02TD1478E:121a-29: lha rnams dgod pa sngon 'gro can //
T02TD1478E:121a-30: dpa' bos khams rnams rnam sbyangs nas //
T02TD1478E:121a-31: sngar bshad pa yi phyag rgyas bcing //
T02TD1478E:121a-32: sen mo so dang skra ba spu //
T02TD1478E:121a-33: pags pa dri ma sha nyid dang //
T02TD1478E:121a-34: rtsa dang rgyus pa mkhal ma dang //
T02TD1478E:121a-35: snying dang de bzhin mig dag dang //
T02TD1478E:121a-36: mkhris pa glo ba rgyu ma dang //
T02TD1478E:121a-37: gnye ma de bzhin lto ba dang //
T02TD1478E:121a-38: bshang ba mtshan ma bad kan dang //
T02TD1478E:121a-39: rnag dang de bzhin khrag dang ni //
T02TD1478E:121a-40: rdul dang de bzhin mchi ma dang //
T02TD1478E:121a-41: mchil ma dang ni ngar snabs nyid //
T02TD1478E:121a-42: khams rnams go rims ji bzhin du //
T02TD1478E:121a-43: dpa' bo rnams kyis yang dag sbyar //
T02TD1478E:121a-44: sngar bshad pa yi go rims las //
T02TD1478E:121a-45: de rnams gzhan ni mi bya'o//
T02TD1478E:121a-46: rkang pa brgyad kyis mgon po mchod //
T02TD1478E:121a-47: mkha' 'gro ma sogs rang ming lus //
T02TD1478E:121a-48: aom dang h'um gnyis ming spel la //
T02TD1478E:121a-49: mthar yang h'um phat sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1478E:121a-51: ka ra ka ra sogs pas mchod //
T02TD1478E:121a-52: 'dir ni tshig ni thams cad kyang //
T02TD1478E:121b-0: snga ma'i @121b tshul gyis spel bar bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-1: aom na mo bha ga pa te //
T02TD1478E:121b-2: b'i re sh'a ya dang por bri //
T02TD1478E:121b-3: ma h'a ka lp'a gni'i sgra dang //
T02TD1478E:121b-4: sanni bh'a ya de rjes bri //
T02TD1478E:121b-5: de nas dzat mu ku ta //
T02TD1478E:121b-6: autka t'a yi sgra bri bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-7: dam shta ka r'a lo gra dang //
T02TD1478E:121b-8: bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya bri //
T02TD1478E:121b-9: sa ha sra bhu dz'a'i sgra rjes //
T02TD1478E:121b-10: bh'a su r'a ya bri bar bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-11: par shu p'a sho dya ta dang //
T02TD1478E:121b-12: sh'u la kha tv'am ga dha ri na //
T02TD1478E:121b-13: by'a ghra'i sgra dang 'dzi na'i tshig / aamba ra dha r'a ya dri //
T02TD1478E:121b-14: ma h'a dhu mbr'andha ka ra //
T02TD1478E:121b-15: de rjes ba pu sh'a ya bri //
T02TD1478E:121b-16: thog mar aom dang tha mar phat //
T02TD1478E:121b-17: bar du h'um h'um nges par sbyar //
T02TD1478E:121b-18: sngags ni rkang pa brgyad ces bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-19: la la tshig re'i mtha' ru sbyar //
T02TD1478E:121b-20: ka ra'i sgra dang de bzhin du //
T02TD1478E:121b-21: ku ru'i sgra yang gnyis su bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-22: bandha tr'a sa ya gnyis te //
T02TD1478E:121b-23: ksho bha ya gnyis de bzhin du //
T02TD1478E:121b-24: hroom hroom hra: phem phem dang //
T02TD1478E:121b-25: phat dang da ha'i tshig gnyis bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-26: pa tsa bha ksha'i tshig gnyis gnyis //
T02TD1478E:121b-27: ba sa thung du nges par sbyar //
T02TD1478E:121b-28: ru dhi r'a ntra'i tshig gnyis dang ;
T02TD1478E:121b-29: / m'a l'a ba lam pi ne dang //
T02TD1478E:121b-30: gri hna gri hna de bzhin du //
T02TD1478E:121b-31: sa pta p'a t'a la gata //
T02TD1478E:121b-32: bhu dzam ga sarbam b'a brjod //
T02TD1478E:121b-33: ta rdza ya yang lan gnyis brjod //
T02TD1478E:121b-35: hrim hrim dznoom dznoom nges par sbyar //
T02TD1478E:121b-37: h'um h'um ki li ki li dang //
T02TD1478E:121b-38: si li si li hi li gnyis //
T02TD1478E:121b-39: dhi li dhi li h'um gnyis phat //
T02TD1478E:121b-40: bcas pas rtsa ba'i sngags su bshad //
T02TD1478E:121b-41: aom shr'i badzra he he dang //
T02TD1478E:121b-42: ru ru kam yang de nas brjod //
T02TD1478E:121b-43: h'um d'a ki n'a dz'a la sam //
T02TD1478E:121b-44: ba ra zhes bya ba yang bri //
T02TD1478E:121b-45: sv'a h'a'i mthar bcas mgon po yi //
T02TD1478E:121b-46: snying po'i yi ge nyi shu gnyis //
T02TD1478E:121b-47: de dang nye ba'i yi ge bdun //
T02TD1478E:121b-48: go bzlog pa yis gzung bar bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-49: phat h'um h'um ha ha hri: aom //
T02TD1478E:121b-50: phag mo'i gsang sngags gnyis ka yang //
T02TD1478E:121b-51: lugs las bzlog par shes par bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-52: h'a sv'a phat h'um h'um ye n'i rnna wa badzra ba ye n'i ki d'a ddha burbas aom //
T02TD1478E:121b-54: 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin //
T02TD1478E:121b-55: mtshams kun du ni gtor ma dag / kun spyod rgyud las bshad bzhin bya //
T02TD1478E:121b-56: aom aa ralli ho dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho //
T02TD1478E:121b-57: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba yaksha r'a ksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa aunm'a da /
T02TD1478E:121b-58: aa pasma ra badzra d'a kam n+ya da ya /
T02TD1478E:122a-11: satshu kha bi briddha ye sa ha yi ka bha bantu h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1478E:122a-12: sngags la legs gnas chos bdag nyid /
T02TD1478E:122a-13: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te //
T02TD1478E:122a-14: rtag tu tshangs par spyod gyur pa //
T02TD1478E:122a-15: he ru ka dpal gnyis pa 'dra //
T02TD1478E:122a-16: 'di dag thams cad rab spyad pa //
T02TD1478E:122a-18: bdag gis sngom med rang bzor ni //
T02TD1478E:122a-19: rnal 'byor cung zad ci yang med //
T02TD1478E:122a-20: sngon gyi slob dpon gyis bshad las ;
T02TD1478E:122a-21: / sgrub ba'i thabs su gzhag pa yin //
T02TD1478E:122a-23: bsod nams dri med gang theb des //
T02TD1478E:122a-25: sangs rgyas ye shes nyid thob shog / mun nag 'dra ba'i sku 'dzin 'gro ba kun gyi mun pa shin tu 'joms //
T02TD1478E:122a-26: 'jigs pa'i skur mdzad 'jigs pa ma lus myur du sel bar mdzad //
T02TD1478E:122a-27: 'khor bar rgyu bar mdzad cing 'khor ba'i nang du gnas mi bzod //
T02TD1478E:122a-28: de ltar ngo mtshar spyod yul bcom ldan gtum chen skur ldan phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1478E:122a-29: dpal he ru ka'i sgrub ba'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1478E:122a-31: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya dharma shr'i bha dra dang /
T02TD1478E:122a-32: lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
